column4: SPeaking of filesystem layouts and what not.  Does anyone have a link that sorta of discusses or explains what the default directories are intended to be used for?  /etc and /usr and /bin and well, I'm sure they all mean something but it's all greek to me
had the same question starting out.  Found this : http://www.tldp.org/LDP/Linux-Filesystem-Hierarchy/html/index.html
Solaris is an entirely different OS
